document.full_text: long-hitting bubba watson eagled the par-five 11th for a second consecutive day on his way to a one-shot lead in the second round of the new orleans classic on friday.
document.title: eagle hunter bubba watson takes charge in new orleans
lines_and_colors: long-hitting bubba watson eagled the par-five 11th for a second consecutive day on his way to a one-shot lead in the second round of the new orleans classic on friday.
